page.title: 19LONGHAM_THE GREEK INFLUENCE
page.content: The Kinson,Longham area is one not normally associated with Foreign influences.The nearby Bournemouth area is an all year round favourite with tourists because of its mild climate and beaches.Foreign visitors are frequent but few settle to live in the area. Longham was visited by a couple who had recently lost their holiday hotel as a result of the Turkish invasion of Cyprus in 1974.The river,its swans,a derelict building and an overgrown site inspired the couple to settle here and start anew in the hotel trade. Local residents and visitors alike may now join in Greek evenings,hear Greek music and eat Greek food in the heart of rural Dorset.
